Desc.entry: A registered charity which aims to promote the sexual health and emotional well-being of young people up to the age of 25 in Sheffield, in particular those who are vulnerable, disadvantaged and marginalised. Current projects include Fruitbowl, a youth group for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender young people aged 18 years and under (see separate entry), and Yambo, asupport group for young people aged 12-19 years who are living with HIV.
